{"step_by_step_thinking": "Idiopathic cholestasis of pregnancy is characterized by pruritus, elevated serum bile acids, and abnormal liver function tests. The features of idiopathic cholestasis of pregnancy typically include elevated serum bilirubin, elevated alkaline phosphatase, and elevated SGPT. Prolongation of prothrombin time is not typically associated with idiopathic cholestasis of pregnancy. Therefore, the correct answer is D. Prolongation of prothrombin time.", "answer_choice": "D"}
